description.originalText: Paige has been an exceptional nanny to our daughter for the past two years and has truly become part of our family. Her warm personality and genuine care have made a lasting impact as she supported our daughter through every stage, from infancy to toddlerhood, helping her achieve countless milestones along the way. We only have the highest praise for Paige, and the only reason we are parting ways is due to our relocation. Any family would be incredibly fortunate to have her as part of their lives.

description.displayText: Families should know that if they hire Paige they are getting the full package. I've had the honor of knowing Paige from an adolescent and have had her babysit for my own children on numerous occasions. Paige is humorous, energetic , kind and patient with the kids. While household duties were NOT required, I would always come home to the dishes done and all the kids spaces tidied. She was always very reliable and punctual. I never had a worry and I hope another family gets to experience this gem of a nanny
